name: Ios-flip-switch
tagline: another ios styled checkboxes with touch drag support
body:
### Why another one iOS flip switcher?. It is free for all, it is fully support mobile devices, no images just CSS3, and because when it was written, here was no free alternative to it. ### Usage. Just include jQuery, plugin css and js files and you attach it: ``` ``` ### Examples
### Browser Support Tested on: Firefox 22+ Chrome 28+ IE 9 + IOS6 Safari Android (Firefox, Chrome, old default browser)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
